sentences.sentence: Blue Monday is usually the third day in January and claims to be the most depressing day of the year.
Firstly, what sort of sardonic mathematician felt like it was necessary to calculate the saddest day of the year?
Secondly, why is "time since Christmas" a variable in the equation?

Lastly, it's day one million of a lockdown and I'm going to treat myself to some tender love and care (TLC).I'm not even going to get into the history of Blue Monday, but here are the variables that go into the equation: weather, debt, monthly salary, time since Christmas, time since failing our new year's resolutions, low motivational levels and the feeling of a need to take action.
As fun as this equation isn't, it certainly does not take "time since pandemic hit" into consideration.

Thus, it's completely invalid for at least this year, but likely all years.First place to start my self-gratifying journey is this still completely relevant article, When life gives you 2020, eat these chocolates(https://nationalpost.com/shopping-essentials/holiday-guide/when-life-gives-you-2020-eat-these-chocolates).

Then, I took to the world-wide internet and found these three immediate gratification items...Bread makerMy mother has made me too paranoid to go to sleep with a small appliance on, but I can use a 13-hour delay-start timer whilst awake.

This bread maker(https://www.wayfair.ca/dining/pdp/cuisinart-compact-automatic-bread-maker-dvzj2080.html?&;experiencetype=2&;selectedvertical=3) has everything I need to make a fresh loaf any time of the day.
And it's so compact - because the last thing I need to buy is clutter.

And this Canadian artisan has some 150-year-old sourdough starter(https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/783541010/150-year-old-san-francisco-sourdough?ga_order=most_relevant&;ga_search_type=all&;ga_view_type=gallery&;ga_search_query=bread+baking+kit&;ref=sr_gallery-1-1&;bes=1) to get rolling.Cuisinart Compact Automatic Bread Maker5 hobbies to keep you entertained during any level of lockdown(https://nationalpost.com/shopping-essentials/5-hobbies-to-keep-you-entertained-during-any-level-of-lockdown)Muck Boot's new waterproof 'hunting boot' is actually perfect for the urban Canadian(https://nationalpost.com/shopping-essentials/muck-boots-new-waterproof-hunting-boot-is-actually-perfect-for-the-urban-canadian)Haven't mastered winter running?

Start with this gear to stay warm and upright(https://nationalpost.com/shopping-essentials/havent-mastered-winter-running-start-with-this-gear-to-stay-warm-and-upright)Magic tea steeper(https://www.davidstea.com/ca_en/teaware/16-oz-steeper/902960DT01VAR0074573.html?gclid=Cj0KCQiA9P__BRC0ARIsAEZ6irg99XldpmI4-DbxSKizOPY5TWMwPWIVKWG3Yjkd193DYYNsaf-XGcsaAkS0EALw_wcB)It's less of 'a magic' and more of 'a satisfying' tea steeper.
The steeper is clear, so you can see the beautiful tea leaves unleashing their flavours.
When you're ready to enjoy your beverage, put the steeper on a cup and tea magically pours out.

And then the Tea Tasting Club(https://www.davidstea.com/ca_en/tea/collections/tea-tasting-club/) delivers seasonal flavours, for the TLC purchase that keeps on giving..16 oz steeperTop movies scratch-off poster(https://www.etsy.com/ca/listing/653508678/100-movies-scratch-off-poster-top-films?ga_order=most_relevant&;ga_search_type=all&;ga_view_type=gallery&;ga_search_query=scratch+poster&;ref=sr_gallery-1-2&;pro=1)Instead of watching a movie, I end up watching the Netflix menu.
And then I go into a monologue about the shows Netflix recommends for me.
I feel like the Netflix line, "because you watch so and so..." ends with, "we're going to punish you.
"Just because I watched the classic film Billy Madison, doesn't mean I should be presented with Hubie Halloween.
Writing about my frustration helps.
The solution to my one-way feud with Netflix is this movie scratch-off poster.
It tells me what to watch and I'll feel satisfied once I've seen all 100 movies.100 Movies Scratch Off Poster - Top Films of All Time Bucket Listrmann@postmedia.comtwitter.com/randimann !
@COPYRIGHT=© 2021 Postmedia Network Inc. All rights reserved.

documents.result_message: Our detector is highly confident that the text is written entirely by a human.
